query:
ALTER TABLE machines 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS model VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS serialNumber VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS manufacturer VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS installationDate DATETIME,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS lastMaintenanceDate DATETIME,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS assignedEmployeeId INT;

ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS assignedEmployeeId INT;
